name: places/ChIJVQ57wHn2wokRT6IlUL6_n5c
formattedAddress: 2427 Adam Clayton Powell Jr Blvd #2, New York, NY 10030, USA
adrFormatAddress: 2427 Adam Clayton Powell Jr Blvd #2, New York, NY 10030-1770, USA

originalText.text:
I’ll be the first to admit that I almost tried to avoid King Laundromat when I moved to the neighborhood. Why? The bad reviews…
HOWEVER!!!
My experience here was beyond excellent! Cici and everyone else who worked at the laundromat made me feel like family from the moment I walked in.

I both dropped off three bags of laundry for wash and fold and did two loads of laundry in store on my own for some more delicate pieces I needed to wash.

Wash and Fold: I brought in THREE big bags to have them washed. Not only did they get it back to me on the same day, but since I informed them all the pieces could be watched together, they were SO considerate. Two of my laundry bags had shoulder straps for carrying, and the third bag didn’t. She made sure to fold my laundry so intentionally that I would only have to carry TWO bags instead of all THREE. (I attached a picture of the two bags!)

Self Wash: The reason I didn’t leave these two bags as wash and fold was because they were a bit more delicate than my typical laundry. Washing didn’t stress me out… but when it came time to tumble dry—or to not tumble dry—I had NO clue how to approach it. Cici had been SO kind from the moment I walked in that I decided to approach her and just asked. And she gave the most PERFECT suggestion and all of my clothes still look just as lovely as they did before.

They have a fantastic staff here that cares about their customers. I hope everyone treats them the same way because they deserve nothing less. I couldn’t have lucked out more having King Laundromat be the closest one to my apartment. :)

originalText.text: If I could give a 0 I would. This ppl are rude and disrespectful. I coming there for months to dry my clothes and today they came with a attitude telling me that if I didn't wash there I can't dry there. They looked my boyfriend funny. Disgusting ppl.

text.text: If I could give a 0 I would. This ppl are rude and disrespectful. I coming there for months to dry my clothes and today they came with a attitude telling me that if I didn't wash there I can't dry there. They looked my boyfriend funny. Disgusting ppl.

originalText.text: People act fake towards me. But I am happy I work hard on washing my clothes when, I wash my clothes.

text.text: People act fake towards me. But I am happy I work hard on washing my clothes when, I wash my clothes.

originalText.text: Most machines have visible mold in the compartments where you add detergent. Spotted a live cockroach INSIDE of the display panel glass on a machine. My clothes smell nice when I let them do wash & fold, but I won't be coming back here due to how unsanitary the conditions are.

text.text: Most machines have visible mold in the compartments where you add detergent. Spotted a live cockroach INSIDE of the display panel glass on a machine. My clothes smell nice when I let them do wash & fold, but I won't be coming back here due to how unsanitary the conditions are.

originalText.text: HORRRIBLE ...my clothes literally smelled because the person before clothes left a stench in the washing machine and it wasn’t properly aired out and sanitized. I had to spend double the money to go to another laundry mat to clean my clothes twice back to back .. their dryers are always low heat and the water pressure is low .. they need to be shut down because the quality is going down hill and it’s always crowded .
